name: Syd Sidney - Light in the Dark

metadata.description:
This song is about committing to being open, about allowing for the darkness *and* the light. 

But this recording, this release, this is about the power of friendship and collaboration. 

Without the prompt from my friend to “just write and record one quickly,” I wouldn’t have. Without Zac singing with me, Scott making the mix, and ATW designing the cover this song is just another session on my hard drive. 

And without you collecting it, it’s another bundle of bits floating by on the endless stream. Thank you for doing more than just listening.

lyrics.text:
I need to connect my heart
Back to the words I say
Tell you something
Before I fade…away

If I believed in all my thoughts
I’d end up nobody
Convinced that the best of me
Is long gone and behind

What if it was ?
What if I can’t ?
What if I never ?

Come back to you
And tell you the truth
And tell you that
Whether or not I’m beginning or ending I’m shining a light in the dark 

I promised I’d find a way to get better
Pills or patience or time
Pick a path let it ride

But what I choose won’t make a difference
If I don’t come to grips
With what’s really been making me sick
living a past life

Not if I was
Not if I can’t 
Not if I never

Come back to you
And tell you the truth
And tell you that
Whether or not I’m beginning or ending I’m shining a light in the dark
Whatever I find I am finally descending I’m shining a light in the dark
In the dark

metadata.name: Light in the Dark #1
metadata.title: Light in the Dark
